## Description {#details}

Represents a fixed-width value in a bitcode record.

Note that the LLVM bitcode format only supports unsigned values.

Definition at line 78 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/bitcode/bitcodeconvenience-h">BitcodeConvenience.h</a>.
